lead_paragraph: A new trial involving 21,000 people in six countries suggests that a cow or a goat and the belief in a better future can significantly impact poverty.

headline.print_headline: The Power of Hope Is Real
headline.main: The Power of Hope Is Real

snippet: A new trial involving 21,000 people in six countries suggests that a cow or a goat and the belief in a better future can significantly impact poverty.
abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column heralds new randomized trial showing that simple aid package known as a 'graduation program' has exceptionally good success at lifting poor families from poverty; observes program, which essentially consists of donating cow, goat or other livestock, not only gives poor a way to earn money, but also psychological motivation and hope.
